subtitle: -

Narrated by Academy Award-winner Ben Kingsley, this series objectively documents Judaism, Islam, Hinduism, Buddhism, Catholicism, and Protestantism worldwide with interviews from experts. Explore issues that probe the very core of our existence and gain new understanding about humanity. Travel to exotic locations and observe how religions have shaped cultures, changed history, brought us closer together and thrust us into war.
